contest-event.event-date: Jan. 31, 1988 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow.
